projects.name: Weather-Text
description: This is a simple Twilio function that sends the forecast or current conditions to an end user via SMS.

projects.name: Slack-GitHub Integration POC
description: This is a stripped-down version of a Slack webhook created to let team members know whenever a new build has been deployed.

projects.name: Housing Justice
description: This is a civic coding project that helped the Atlanta Legal Aid society in its lawsuit against an allegedly predatory lender.
Used Node.js and Handlebars to add features to a progressive web app used primarily in developing countries
Used PhantomJS to automate collection of geographical information as part of the Global Domination project
Used pure JavaScript to fix bugs on weather.com
Collaborate with business and development team members on Guardian, an application that requests digital rights clearances from RSG Media's RightsLogic API
Use Go (Golang) and React to add features to new digital rights management application
Use Docker, Bash, and CircleCI to automate build and deployment processes
Create integrations with tools used for collaboration (e.g., Slack) to notify the team of new builds and additional features
Wrote and maintained SQL Server stored procedures used to generate reports utilized by internal and external clients

Used T-SQL and batch scripting to creqate a database maintenance plan that created daily differential and weekly full backups, compressed previous backups created in the same week, and deleted old backups.
